input.sentences: it was a really beautiful day for a wedding .
the special guests had some really nice cars .
the florists did a nice job on the buttonholes for the guys .
the sun shone through the palm leaves-it was such a pretty place .
even the table decorations were pretty special .
output.sentences: It was a beautiful day for a wedding.
Guests decorated the newlywed's car with nice ribbons to commemorate the special day.
The wedding planner did a nice job with the guys' corsages.
It was a perfectly pretty day, and the sun shone through the foliage.
Pretty centerpieces adorned special tables for the wedding party.
